validationRules.researchQualityMet: Research must meet established quality standards
validationRules.evidenceAuthoritative: All findings must be from authoritative sources
validationRules.mcpCompatibilityValidated: Solutions must be compatible with existing MCP context

contextPreservation.researchFindings: Complete research analysis with evidence and validation
contextPreservation.technicalRecommendations: Primary and alternative solutions with rationale
contextPreservation.riskAssessment: Comprehensive risk analysis with mitigation strategies

validationRules.escalationJustified: Clear justification for escalation must be provided
validationRules.alternativesExhausted: All reasonable alternatives must have been explored
validationRules.contextComplete: Complete context must be preserved for strategic decision
validationRules.recommendationsProvided: Partial recommendations must be provided where possible

escalationContext: Clear description of research blockage or limitation
Alternatives explored and reasons for inadequacy
Strategic decision points requiring boomerang input
strategicOptions: Available research paths and their limitations
Risk assessment of proceeding with limited information
decisionSupport: Evidence gathered to date with quality assessment

contextPreservation.researchProgress: All research conducted to date with findings
contextPreservation.blockageAnalysis: Detailed analysis of research limitations and blockages
contextPreservation.partialFindings: Validated findings available for strategic consideration
contextPreservation.alternativeOptions: Explored alternatives and their feasibility assessment
